values.name: users
values.comment: Sorted list of users being affected (empty list means: all)

values.name: accounts
values.comment: Sorted list of accounts being affected (empty list means: all)

values.name: ban_expires
values.comment: System time when ban expires (zero means: ban is no longer effective)

values.name: buffer_capacity
values.comment: Buffer capacity (indicator for how full or empty the buffer is)

values.name: remaining_requests
values.comment: The buffer becomes full if this many requests are sent instantly
